name: mawkish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
showing emotion or love in an awkward or silly way: The film lapses into mawkish sentimentality near the end. Synonyms
drippy informal disapproving
hokey US informal
maudlin
mushy
sentimental
slushy
soppy informal disapproving
